title: The Great Old One
content:
ud of gas so nauseating it prevents creatures from taking actions.

6m 18m CON Save Concentration

Touch an enemy to siphon their life force and regain half as many hit points.

Melee Concentration

Temporarily Banish your target to another plane of existence.

18m CHA Save Concentration

Plants are more susceptible to this spell: they roll with Disadvantage, and still take half of fall the damage if they succeed the roll.

On Save: Target still takes half damage.

Teleport yourself and up to 1
